content.rendered:
Directed by Aniruddha Roy Chowdhury.

Written by Shoojit Sircar. Aniruddha Roy Chowdhury. Ritesh Shah. Ritesh Shah. Ritesh Shah.

Cast Amitabh Bachchan(Deepak Sehgal). Taapsee Pannu(Minal Arora). Kirti Kulhari(Falak Ali). Andrea Tariang(Andrea). Piyush Mishra(Prashant Mehra). Angad Bedi(Rajveer Singh). Vijay Varma(Ankit Malhotra). Raashul Tandon(Dumpy). Tushar Pandey(Vishwajyoti Ghose). Dhritiman Chatterjee(Judge Satyajeet Dutt). Mamata Shankar(Sara Sehgal). Dibang(JCP Amod Mehra). Mamta Malik(S.H.O. Sarla Premchand) . Amit Baisoya(Waiter Mukesh). S.K. Batra(Neighbour Sinha). Prashant Bhagia(Dr. Uday). Arjun Chakrabarty(Ritwik (as Arjun Chakraborty)). Alka Chatwal(The Female Constable In Court). Sushil Dahiya(Ranjit Sherawat). Sudhanva Deshpande(Javed).DJ Farman. Swaroopa Ghosh(Uma Di). Johar Kango(Neighbour Gupta). Rita Kapoor(Mrs. Sinha). Radha Khandelwal(The Female Constable). Shiva Kumar(Inspector). Pawan Mahendru(Minal’s Helpless Father). Jogi Mallang(Police Inspector Shaukeen (as Jogi)). Sakshi Mehta(Suman). Vinod Nagpal(Kasturilal). R. Pandey(Manager Ramakant Vijay). Sima Pari(Prisoner). Arun Poorie(Andrea’s Boss). Vinod Rai(Andrea’s Father). Ritesh Shah(Falak’s Boss). Savita Sharma(Falak’s Mother).Gurbax Singh. Kumar Thakur(Advocate). Mahender Verma(Artist). Veera Ravi Kumar Yalla(Judge)

Language Hindi.

Producers Ashutosh Goswami. Bendev Junior. Hetvi Karia. Sheel Kumar. Ronnie Lahiri. Rashmi Sharma. Amit Singh. Shoojit Sircar.

Production Rashmi Sharma Telefilms.
